Articles.Content:
I searched a while for a solution, but I couldnt find one yet.

So is there a Mod that can increase the limit of offered contracts? I feel like 15 is a bit low if you have several mods which add contracts by themselves..
Did you know that you can reject contracts that you don't like, and they'll be immediately replaced with a newly-generated one?

Yea I do know that I can skip the contracts, but having to skip contracts over and over again with the chance to get a similar contract you just have skipped again, isn't the same as a wider selection (by more contracts at once) and thus increased variety in offered contract.

I agree, this limit is a bit low.

You just have to edit a line in your Contracts.cfg

There you go!

Thanks @Gnou, this felt a bit cheaty but I use my reputation i.e perfect reputation a max 50 contracts, because such an esteemed agency should get to choose their missions, and low reputation less contracts.
